subject: Baseball
Wages and Salaries
lead_paragraph: Saying he wanted to do the right thing, Gil Meche told the Kansas City Royals he did not want any of the $12 million due him in 2011 and retired from baseball.
snippet: Saying he wanted to do the right thing, Gil Meche told the Kansas City Royals he did not want any of the $12 million due him in 2011 and retired from baseball.
